General.Name: Zhejiang Viewshine Intelligent Meter Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Viewshine Intelligent Meter Co.,Ltd engages in developing, manufacturing, and selling intelligent gas information system platforms, intelligent terminals, and ultrasonic metering products. The company offers residential ultrasonic water meters; and residential and commercial ultrasonic gas meters, diaphragm gas meters, industrial RTU IoT products, and industrial NB-IoT and GPRS gas meters. It also provides gas and water cloud software solutions; and gateways, HHUs, repeaters, and valve controllers. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

2.Name: Ms. Yan  Zhang
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
